info.description:
The purpose of this documentation is to provide developers an insight of how to
interact with Mysterium Node via Tequila API.
This should demonstrate all the possible API calls with described parameters and responses.
info.title: Tequila API

get.description: Returns list of access policies

400.description: Failed to parse or request validation failed

parameters.description: Token for which to lookup the reward

get.description: Returns list of proposals filtered by provider id

parameters.description: id of provider proposals
parameters.name: provider_id

parameters.description: the service type of the proposal. Possible values are "openvpn", "wireguard" and "noop"

parameters.description: the access policy id to filter the proposals by
parameters.name: access_policy

parameters.description: the access policy source to filter the proposals by
parameters.name: access_policy_source

parameters.description: If given will filter proposals by node location country.
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: IP Type (residential, datacenter, etc.).
parameters.name: ip_type

parameters.description: Minimum compatibility level of the proposal.
parameters.name: compatibility_min

parameters.description: Maximum compatibility level of the proposal.
parameters.name: compatibility_max

parameters.description: Minimum quality of the provider.
parameters.name: quality_min

parameters.description: Pick nodes compatible with NAT of specified type. Specify "auto" to probe NAT.
parameters.name: nat_compatibility

parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: Page to filter the items by.

APIError.title: APIError represents an error response from REST API service.

AccessPolicy.description: AccessPolicy represents the access controls for proposal

ActivityStatsResponse.title: ActivityStatsResponse reflects a node activity stats.

AuthRequest.title: AuthRequest request used to authenticate to API.

AuthResponse.title: AuthResponse response after successful authentication to API.

BeneficiaryTxStatus.title: BeneficiaryTxStatus settle with beneficiary transaction status.

BugReport.description: BugReport represents user input when submitting an issue report

ChainSummary.title: ChainSummary represents a response for token rewards.

ChangePasswordRequest.title: ChangePasswordRequest request used to change API password.

kill_switch.description: kill switch option restricting communication only through VPN

ConnectionCreateFilter.description:
ConnectionCreateFilter describes filter for the connection request to lookup
for a requested proposals based on specified params.

ConnectionCreateRequestDTO.title: ConnectionCreateRequest request used to start a connection.

service_type.description: service type. Possible values are "openvpn", "wireguard" and "noop"

ConnectionDTO.title: ConnectionDTO holds full consumer connection details.

ConnectionInfoDTO.title: ConnectionInfoDTO holds partial consumer connection details.

throughput_received.description: Download speed in bits per second

throughput_sent.description: Upload speed in bits per second

ConnectionTrafficDTO.title: ConnectionTrafficDTO holds consumer connection traffic information.

CreateBugReportResponse.description: CreateBugReportResponse response for bug report creation

CurrencyExchangeDTO.title: CurrencyExchangeDTO the value of a given currency.

DNSOption.description: DNSOption defines DNS server selection strategy for consumer

DecreaseStakeRequest.description: DecreaseStakeRequest represents the decrease stake request

DownloadNodeUIRequest.description: DownloadNodeUIRequest request for downloading NodeUI version

EarningsPerServiceResponse.description: EarningsPerServiceResponse contains information about earnings per service

FieldError.title: FieldError contains the reason why a field failed validation.

FilterPreset.title: FilterPreset is a pre-defined proposal filter.

IdentityBeneficiaryResponseDTO.title: IdentityBeneficiaryResponse represents the provider beneficiary address.

IdentityCreateRequestDTO.title: IdentityCreateRequest request used for new identity creation.

IdentityCurrentRequestDTO.title: IdentityCurrentRequest request used for current identity remembering.

IdentityExportRequestDTO.title: IdentityExportRequest is received in identity export endpoint.

IdentityImportRequest.title: IdentityImportRequest is received in identity import endpoint.

IdentityRegisterRequestDTO.description: IdentityRegisterRequest represents the identity registration user input parameters

beneficiary.description: Beneficiary: beneficiary to set during registration. Optional.

fee.description: Fee: an agreed amount to pay for registration

referral_token.description: Token: referral token, if the user has one

IdentityRegistrationResponseDTO.description: IdentityRegistrationResponse represents registration status and needed data for registering of given identity

registered.description: Returns true if identity is registered in payments smart contract

IdentityUnlockRequestDTO.title: IdentityUnlockRequest request used for identity unlocking.

ListProposalFilterPresetsResponse.title: ListProposalFilterPresetsResponse holds a list of proposal filter presets.

ListProposalsCountiesResponse.title: ListProposalsCountiesResponse holds number of proposals per country.

LocalVersion.description: LocalVersion it's a local version with extra indicator if it is in use

MMNApiKeyRequest.title: MMNApiKeyRequest request used to manage MMN's API key.

MMNGrantVerificationResponse.description: MMNGrantVerificationResponse message received via redirect from mystnodes.com

MigrationStatusResponse.description: MigrationStatusResponse represents status of the migration

MonitoringAgentResponse.title: MonitoringAgentResponse reflects amount of connectivity statuses for each service_type.

MonitoringAgentStatuses.title: MonitoringAgentStatuses a object represent a [service_type][status]amount of statuses for each service type.

MystnodesSSOLinkResponse.description: MystnodesSSOLinkResponse contains a link to initiate auth via mystnodes

NATTypeDTO.description: NATTypeDTO gives information about NAT type in terms of traversal capabilities

NodeStatusResponse.description: NodeStatusResponse a node status reflects monitoring agent POV on node availability

page.description: The current page of the items.

total_pages.description: The last page of the items.

PaymentChannelDTO.title: PaymentChannelDTO represents represents opened payment channel between identity and hermes.

PaymentOrderOptions.description: PaymentOrderOptions represents pilvytis payment order options

PaymentOrderResponse.title: PaymentOrderResponse holds payment gateway order details.

ProviderConsumersCountResponse.title: ProviderConsumersCountResponse reflects a number of unique consumers served during a period of time.

ProviderEarningsSeriesResponse.title: ProviderEarningsSeriesResponse reflects a earnings series metrics during a period of time.

ProviderSeriesItem.description: ProviderSeriesItem represents a general data series item

ProviderSessionsCountResponse.title: ProviderSessionsCountResponse reflects a number of sessions during a period of time.

ProviderSessionsResponse.title: ProviderSessionsResponse reflects a list of sessions metrics during a period of time.

ProviderSessionsSeriesResponse.title: ProviderSessionsSeriesResponse reflects a sessions data series metrics during a period of time.

ProviderTransferredDataResponse.title: ProviderTransferredDataResponse reflects a number of bytes transferred by provider during a period of time.

ProviderTransferredDataSeriesResponse.title: ProviderTransferredDataSeriesResponse reflects a transferred bytes data series metrics during a period of time.

ReferralTokenResponse.title: ReferralTokenResponse represents a response for referral token.

RegistrationPaymentResponse.title: RegistrationPaymentResponse holds a registration payment order response.

ReportIssueGithubResponse.description: ReportIssueGithubResponse response for github issue creation

ServiceAccessPolicies.description: ServiceAccessPolicies represents the access controls for service start

options.description: options with which service was started. Every service has a unique list of allowed options.

type.description: service type. Possible values are "openvpn", "wireguard" and "noop"

ServiceListResponse.title: ServiceListResponse represents a list of running services on the node.

ServiceStartRequestDTO.title: ServiceStartRequest request used to start a service.

options.description: service options. Every service has a unique list of allowed options.

type.description: service type. Possible values are "openvpn", "wireguard" and "noop"

ServiceStatisticsDTO.description: ServiceStatisticsDTO shows the successful and attempted connection count

SessionListResponse.title: SessionListResponse defines session list representable as json.

page.description: The current page of the items.

total_pages.description: The last page of the items.

SessionStatsAggregatedResponse.title: SessionStatsAggregatedResponse defines aggregated sessions stats response as json.

SessionStatsDTO.title: SessionStatsDTO represents the session aggregated statistics.

SessionStatsDailyResponse.title: SessionStatsDailyResponse defines session stats representable as json.

SettleRequestDTO.description: SettleRequest represents the request to settle hermes promises

SettleState.description: SettleState represents the state of settle with beneficiary transaction

SettlementListResponse.title: SettlementListResponse defines settlement list representable as json.

page.description: The current page of the items.

total_pages.description: The last page of the items.

SwitchNodeUIRequest.description: SwitchNodeUIRequest request for switching NodeUI version

TermsRequest.title: TermsRequest object is accepted by terms endpoints.

TermsResponse.title: TermsResponse object is returned by terms endpoints.

TokenRewardAmount.title: TokenRewardAmount represents a response for token rewards.

Tokens.description: Tokens a common response for ethereum blockchain monetary amount

UserReport.description: UserReport represents user input when submitting an issue report

WithdrawRequestDTO.title: WithdrawRequest represents the request to withdraw earnings to l1.
